text:
[Verse]
Waking up today
With a smile on my face
Raindrops falling down
In this beautiful place

[Verse 2]
Puddles on the ground
Splashing all around
Kicking off my shoes
Happiness is found

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the rhythm start
Dancing in the rain
Joy within my heart

[Bridge]
No worries on my mind
Let the rain unwind
Freedom in the air
Leave it all behind

[Verse 3]
Twist and turn and spin
Let the fun begin
Raindrops on my skin
With a happy grin

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the rhythm start
Dancing in the rain
Joy within my heart
title: Dancing in the Rain
